title: Fish Ball Kyay-Oh
description: A traditional Burmese noodle soup made with tender fish balls, rice noodles, and a fragrant broth infused with lemongrass, ginger, and garlic.

title: Chicken Kyay-Oh
description: A satisfying noodle soup with tender chicken and fresh veggies in a flavorful broth. Perfect for lunch or dinner.

title: Prawn Kyay-Oh
description: A delicious noodle soup made with succulent prawns, vegetables, and aromatic spices.

title: Sour and Spicy Kyay-Oh
description: A tantalizing combination of tender chicken, juicy pork, and succulent prawn in a spicy and sour broth, served with rice noodles and fresh herbs.
